definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

pinyin: kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3 ruan3 jian4

sentences.english: I was pleasantly surprised to find several well-established open source initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴地发现了几个出色的开放源码项目。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代码将遵循开放源码许可证发布。

sentences.english: It also inherits open source tooling for management and backup.
sentences.chinese: 它还继承了用于管理和备份的开放源码工具。

sentences.english: Each of these points needs to be considered when hitching an open source project to a corporate bandwagon.
sentences.chinese: 在承担公司的开放源码项目时，需要考虑上述要点。

sentences.english: This was a new and interesting application of the open source model.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个新的非常有趣的开放源码模型的应用。

sentences.english: Licensees are free to access and use the source code of open source software.
sentences.chinese: 被许可方可以自由访问和使用开放源码软件的源代码。

sentences.english: Proliferation and use of open source assets.
sentences.chinese: 开放源码资产的使用和扩散。

sentences.english: Hopefully, the open-source world will take care of that.
sentences.chinese: 希望开放源码界注意到这点。

sentences.english: What is the attraction of open source, anyway?
sentences.chinese: 开放源码的吸引力到底是什么呢？

sentences.english: It's free software with a liberal open source license.
sentences.chinese: 它是自由软件，有一个自由的开放源码许可。

sentences.english: Also, in open source, who will support it?
sentences.chinese: 而且，在开放源码社区中，谁会支持它？

sentences.english: Like many open source tools, the documentation could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 与许多开放源码工具一样，文档还有待改进。

sentences.english: A user can mix and match open source software with any other software.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以将开放源码软件与其他任何软件混合和匹配。

sentences.english: May your favorite open source trail be discovered, too.
sentences.chinese: 祝您所喜爱的开放源码“小径”也被大家所发现。

sentences.english: Do you want to make money from your open source software?
sentences.chinese: 您想要利用自己的开放源码软件卖钱吗？

sentences.english: This is a stellar roster of open source committers and innovators.
sentences.chinese: 这是开放源码参与者和创新者的一个全名星队。

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
free software (i.e. software for which sharing, modification etc is permitted)
to expand one's financial resources/abbr. for 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]

pinyin: kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3 ruan3 jian4
ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2
ke3 kuo4 zhan3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2
